ygData.subject: RE: Special foraged foods
ygData.msgSnippet: I never use hide (invis song instead) and usually only forage after I have died.  I hate the you are low on food/water spams you get all the time while
ygData.messageBody:
I never use hide (invis song instead) and usually only forage after I have
died. I hate the "you are low on food/water" spams you get all the time
while running back to your corpse. I succeed so rarely with forage that I
tend to forget about trying it in between combats.

Galtin of E'ci


> I think it would be interesting to get a list poll up to see how many
> bards on the list actually use forage or hide, or even have them in
> their hotkeys. We'd have to have a seperate section for wood elf bards
> as the wood elf natural cap is actually 10 higher than the default
> bard's (hmm, another contradiction to the jack of foraging idea)
>
>
